name: Daisy
summary: Daisy is a cocktail recipe app that allows users to easily browse cocktails as well as upload their own. Daisy also features a cocktail randomizer and a cravings quiz to help filter results based on what the user is craving.

name: Nicetapes
summary: Nicetapes was my frontend capstone project at NSS. It serves as a catalog that represents a user's own physical VHS Tape collection. It features full CRUD capabilites as well as profile pages specific to the logged in user.
